subdisciplines.name: Agribusiness Management
subdisciplines.description: The study of management principles and practices within agricultural businesses.

subdisciplines.name: Agricultural Finance
subdisciplines.description: The study of financial principles applied to agricultural businesses, including risk management, investment analysis, and farm credit.

subdisciplines.name: Agricultural Marketing
subdisciplines.description: The study of the marketing of agricultural products, including pricing, promotion, and distribution methods.

subdisciplines.name: Agricultural Policy
subdisciplines.description: The study of government policies that affect agriculture and the agricultural industry, including trade, subsidies, and regulations.
